item.title: Transverse Phase Space Tomography at FACET-II
item.description: arXiv:2508.06013v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We present transverse phase space tomographic reconstruction of the two-bunch configuration at FACET-II. We demonstrate diagnosing two superimposed electron bunches with different transverse phase spaces using a single quadrupole scan. Tuning the bunch charge revealed unexpected space-charge-dominated dynamics.
item.dc:creator: Yiheng Ye, Spencer Gessner
